## noopRaceCancel variable

A no-op implemenation of a [RaceCancelFn](./race-cancellation.racecancelfn.md) function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
noopRaceCancel: RaceCancelFn
```

## Remarks

Allows an async function to add cancellation support in a backwards compatible way by adding optional param by providing this as a default.
